name: SaveTheForest
description:
Daniel's game from a 3 day GameJam in Construct 2 done with my kids

See http://codethegame.blogspot.co.uk/2017/07/three-day-gamejam-day-1.html

Its BattleCats, but for two players. One player players the humans (keys 1 & 2 to spawn), the other plays the animals (keys 9 & 0 to spawn)
